title: GPT-3.5 per token â€“ Llama3 8B (Ruf & Mortas)
description:
In the absence of reliable data on the energy consumption of GPT-3.5, this information is extrapolated from the freely available language model Llama 3 8B. The number of parameters in Llama 3 8B is 8 billion, whereas GPT-3.5 has a much larger parameter count of 175 billion.

Therefore, we assume that submitting a query to GPT-3 requires 22x more energy.
